# Description

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update

# Testing Steps

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes.

- [ ] Ran `flutter test`
- [ ] Manual testing (describe below)

# Quality Assurance Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (dart format)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings (dart analyze)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally

# Git Workflow Checklist

- [ ] Branch name follows convention (`feature/name`, `fix/name`)
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits (`feat: description`)

# Security & Performance

- [ ] No sensitive data (passwords, API keys) committed
- [ ] No hardcoded URLs in code
- [ ] No performance regressions identified
